common.coreFeatures: 核 心 特 性
common.coreFeaturesDesc: StreamPark™ 让流处理作业开发 & 管理更简单的核心特性
common.development: 开 发 框 架
common.developmentDesc: StreamPark™ 提供了开发框架，可快速完成流处理作业开发
common.startUsingTitle: 一条命令开启 Apache StreamPark™ 实时计算之旅
common.installOtherVersionDescription: 您也可以从这个页面安装其他发行版本：

slogan.description: Apache StreamPark™ 是一个简单易用的流处理应用开发框架和一站式云原生实时计算平台，为流作业提供全生命周期管理能力。

feature.title: 流应用开发框架
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 提供流作业开发框架，旨在简化 Apache Flink® 和 Apache Spark™ 作业的开发流程。低代码实现复杂流处理逻辑，内置大量快捷的API 和 即插即用的连接器，降低流处理学习成本与开发难度。

feature.title: 一站式实时计算平台
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 提供了一站式的流计算平台，云原生架构设计，无缝对接 Apache Hadoop 和 Kubernetes 生态，核心能力包括不限于应用开发、部署、管理、运维、实时数仓等，极大提升流应用开发与运维管理效率。

feature.title: 流批融合
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 兼容流计算引擎 Apache Flink® 和微批处理引擎 Apache Spark™，实现真正的流批一体化融合。作为业界首个支持多引擎、多版本的统一平台，它为用户提供灵活高效的流作业开发与管理体验，适用于多种实时计算场景。

feature.title: 丰富的生态组件
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 已与众多开源工具深度集成，支持包括 Apache Flink®、Apache Spark™、Apache Paimon™、Apache Doris、ML/AI 等在内的多种生态组件。通过广泛的兼容性和灵活的技术选型，为用户提供高效的实时计算解决方案。

feature.title: 极简易用
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 致力于降低用户的学习和使用门槛，提供开箱即用的流作业开发体验。仅需部署一个服务组件，无需繁琐配置，即可快速运行。内置直观的可视化管理界面，简化流作业的开发与运维流程，让即使是初学者也能在几分钟内轻松上手使用。

feature.title: 成熟稳定
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ 经过多家企业在大规模生产环境中的验证，展现出卓越的稳定性和可靠性。具备秒级作业状态同步、实时监控及智能告警通知能力，高效保障系统稳定运行，为业务的持续发展提供坚实支撑。

development.title: 编写代码
development.description: 1. 使用 Apache StreamPark™ 提供的快捷 API 开发流处理作业。

development.title: 调试代码
development.description: 2. 传入 Apache StreamPark™ 约定的配置，进行本地作业开发调试。

development.title: 部署作业
development.description: 3. 使用 Apache StreamPark™ 提供的平台来部署和管理你的作业。

users.title: Apache StreamPark™ 赢得了诸多用户的信赖
users.description: Apache StreamPark™ 已经被广泛应用于金融、电商、物流、互联网、制造等行业，帮助用户快速构建和管理流处理作业，提升数据处理效率。

common.coreFeaturesDesc: The key features of StreamPark™ is to make your stream processing easier.
common.developmentDesc: StreamPark™ provided a development framework to quickly develop stream processing applications.
common.startUsingTitle: Start using Apache StreamPark™ in minutes
common.installOtherVersionDescription: Or install other release version from the

slogan.description: Apache StreamPark™ is an easy-to-use streaming application development framework and one-stop cloud-native real-time computing platform.

feature.title: Development Framework
feature.details: Provides a framework to simplify Apache Flink® and Apache Spark™ application development, with plug-and-play connectors that reduce the learning curve and development complexity, improving efficiency.

feature.title: Streaming Platform
feature.details: Provides a streaming applications operation and management platform. It covers the entire lifecycle — from development and build, deployment and launch, state management and maintenance.

feature.title: Unified Batch & Streaming
feature.details: Supports both Apache Flink® and Apache Spark™, enabling seamless integration of streaming and batch processing, with multi-engine and multi-version support on a single platform.

feature.title: Rich Ecosystem
feature.details: Integrates with a variety of open-source tools, including Apache Flink®, Apache Spark™, Apache Paimon™, Apache Doris, and ML/AI. Offering users greater flexibility in technology choices.

feature.title: Easy to use
feature.details: Apache StreamPark™ is designed to lower the learning curve and entry barrier. It requires only one service, making deployment easy and allowing even beginners to get started within minutes.

feature.title: Mature and Stable
feature.details: Widely deployed in large-scale production environments, offering second-level application state tracking, real-time monitoring, and alert notifications to ensure stability and support ongoing project growth.

development.title: Write Code
development.description: 1. Develop your code quickly using the StreamPark™ API

development.title: Debug Application
development.description: 2. Debug your code with the application configuration

development.title: Deploy Application
development.description: 3. Deploy and manage your applications using StreamPark™

users.title: Apache StreamPark™ is trust by
users.description: StreamPark™ has been widely used in finance, e-commerce, logistics, Internet, manufacturing and other industries, helping users quickly build and manage stream processing applications and improve data processing efficiency.
